gw.api.builder

Class CancellationBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.databuilder.DataBuilder<PolicyPeriod,B>
      • gw.api.builder.JobBuilder<B>
        • gw.api.builder.NonSubmissionJobBuilder<CancellationBuilder>
          • gw.api.builder.CancellationBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ValueGenerator<PolicyPeriod>

    public class CancellationBuilder
extends NonSubmissionJobBuilder<CancellationBuilder>
    Builder for a Cancellation job. Simple usage is 
       new CancellationBuilder().createAndCommit()
   new CancellationBuilder(basedOn).createAndCommit()
   new CancellationBuilder(basedOn).withEffectiveDate(cancelDate).createAndCommit()

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CancellationBuilder()
      Create a CancellationBuilder with the following defaults: PropertyValueTo change StatusBOUNDwithStatus(CancellationStatus) RefundCalculationMethodFLATwithRefundCalculationMethod(CalculationMethod) SourceCARRIERwithCancellationSource(CancellationSource) ReasonNONPAYMENTwithCancelReasonCode(ReasonCode) The populator which handles PeriodStatus runs at POSTPROCESS_PRIORITY_2.
      CancellationBuilder(PolicyPeriod basedOn)
      Construct CancellationBuilder() with the specified BasedOn period.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CancellationBuilder

        public CancellationBuilder(PolicyPeriod basedOn)
        Construct CancellationBuilder() with the specified BasedOn period.

      • CancellationBuilder

        public CancellationBuilder()
        Create a CancellationBuilder with the following defaults:
        PropertyValueTo change
        StatusBOUNDwithStatus(CancellationStatus)
        RefundCalculationMethodFLATwithRefundCalculationMethod(CalculationMethod)
        SourceCARRIERwithCancellationSource(CancellationSource)
        ReasonNONPAYMENTwithCancelReasonCode(ReasonCode)

        The populator which handles PeriodStatus runs at POSTPROCESS_PRIORITY_2.

      • bind

        public void bind()
        Bind the last Cancellation created with this builder. Validation and UWIssue validation may or may not be run, depending on what has been previously specified via JobBuilder.withValidation() and JobBuilder.withUWIssueEvaluation()
        Specified by:
        bind in class NonSubmissionJobBuilder<CancellationBuilder>
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if no Cancellation has been created with this builder

      • quote

        public static void quote(PolicyPeriod canceledPeriod,
                         boolean skipValidation,
                         boolean skipEvaluation)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if Job associated with canceledPeriod is not a Cancellation

      • bind

        public static void bind(PolicyPeriod canceledPeriod)
        Bind canceledPeriod. Validation and UW Issue Evaluation both run.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if Job associated with canceledPeriod is not a Cancellation

      • scheduleCancellation

        public static void scheduleCancellation(PolicyPeriod canceledPeriod)
        Schedule cancellation on given period as of its EffectiveDate. Validation and UW Issue Evaluation both run.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if Job associated with canceledPeriod is not a Cancellation

        Schedule cancellation on given period as of its EffectiveDate.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if Job associated with canceledPeriod is not a Cancellation

      • withCancelReasonCode

        public CancellationBuilder withCancelReasonCode(ReasonCode reasonCode)
        Sets the CancelReasonCode. If reasonCode == TC_FLATREWRITE, also sets RefundCalculationMethod to TC_FLAT.

      • getDefaultEffectiveDateFromBasedOnPeriod

        public java.util.Date getDefaultEffectiveDateFromBasedOnPeriod(PolicyPeriod period)
        Description copied from class: NonSubmissionJobBuilder
        Subclasses must define this to return the correct EffectiveDate based on the given BasedOn period. (This can vary according to the Job Type.)
        Specified by:
        getDefaultEffectiveDateFromBasedOnPeriod in class NonSubmissionJobBuilder<CancellationBuilder>

      • initializeBillingOptionsAfterQuoting

        protected void initializeBillingOptionsAfterQuoting(PolicyPeriod period)
        Description copied from class: JobBuilder
        Sets foreign key PolicyPeriod.SelectedPaymentPlan to applicable plan in PolicyPeriod.PaymentPlans array. Should only be called after quoting, as we retrieve PaymentPlans from billing system at end of quote process.
        Overrides:
        initializeBillingOptionsAfterQuoting in class JobBuilder<CancellationBuilder>
